Comment: In the 1980s, robots at the Hamtramck Michigan plant caused significant problems, including smashing windows and painting each other, due to a lack of understanding and proper implementation.  It isn't the scientists that are at fault or the engineers that built them most likely. It probably is more likely user error.
Author: ComputerRedneck
